full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSNYEN GNAS YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'I SDOM PA 'BOGS PA'I CHO GA LAG LEN SNYING PO BSDUS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @039A *, , (YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'I 'DIS BDAG 'PHAGS PA ZHES SOGS SNGAR DANG 'DRA, MJUG TU THABS LEGS BRJOD, ,YANG LAG BRGYAD @039B PA'I SDOM PA 'BOGS PA'I CHO GA NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BA 'DI NI, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BU STON RIN PO CHE'I GSUNG RAB DGONGS DON LTAR 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL GYI PHYAG ZHES SU GNANG BA LA GZHI BYAS, TSIG DON RNAMS DKYUS SU BSHAD NA RTOGS DKA' BAS NA, GSAL BYED KYI LHAN THABS LOGS SU LA 'PHANGS TE, LAG LEN SNYING PO BSDUS PA 'DI NI, KHYIN PA RNAMS KYIS NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BA'I SLAD DU, ,ZA HOR GYI BANDE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS BYANG TAL KHAR SBYAR, ,ZLA TSES LA, ,)
author_simple: ZA HOR GYI BANDE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSO,
